Summary: Boomerang shape with approximatly six white lights with one red light.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around June 30th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking through the woods on a trail on my way to make a fire when i looked up and toward my right and a little bit above the tree line i saw a slow moving flying object in the shape of a boomerange with a red light in the front and appoximatly six white lights 3 on either side. The last light that was on the side the ufo was facing me was pretty bright. Then my friend and I kept walking thinking that it was a plane or something when the object made a really weird suction like noise with a few sudden beeps, the sound was like nothing that i ever heard before and stopped us in our tracks and it also produced a slight wind and when i looked up at the object again it just vanished and was no where to be seen. The sound was the strangest and out of this world sound that i ever heard and after hearing there was no doubt that what i saw wasn't from this planet
